cause.description:
This description is from www.klove.com, where I "heard" about this cause:
"Today is the day to make a difference!
Your gift will help people in Africa affected by HIV and AIDS receive hope through treatment, resources, and support. Children orphaned by AIDs will be cared for - and most importantly, they’ll have the good news of Jesus and the salvation message shared with them.
Your gift of $62 will positively impact an AIDS-affected community for one week."
ONE WEEK ! that's a big deal. you can easily spend that on a couple of shirts at the mall, or on a date... this is your chance to give back and have it really mean something. you could save a LIFE. and, what you give is going to come back to you. that's just karma. :]
check out http://www.fh.org/ to learn more and make a donation.
1. It is up to us to change the face of Africa !
2. Provide education on prevention of HIV/AIDS infections
3. Educate individuals and families to increase abstinence before marriage, faithfulness in marriage, and to adopt other healthy practices
4. Provide compassionate home-based care and counseling to victims and their families
5. Improve quality of life for orphans and vulnerable children affected by HIV/AIDS
6. Promote community-wide education to decrease the stigma of HIV/AIDS
7. Respond to the physical and emotional needs of orphans
8. Provide counseling for families to assist in the coping process
cause.mission: Help people in Africa affected by HIV and AIDS receive hope through treatment, resources, and support.
